name: aai-vehicles-flame-tumbler
title: AAI-载具-火焰突击车
author: Earendel
description: 对撞击伤害有高抗性的高速度突击车，配备火焰喷射器。非常适合突击，野外探索以及hit-and-run战术。搭配AAI-可编程载具MOD可以自动运行。
description_original: A very high speed ramming vehicle hardened against collision damage and armed with a flamethrower. Suitable for rapid base assault, wilderness exploration, and hit-and-run engagements. Can be automated with AAI Programmable Vehicles mod.
